basics.name: Arthur Tabary
basics.label: Physicist and Engineer in Computational Science
basics.summary: Physicist and engineer specializing in computational science with experience in machine learning, image analysis, and computer graphics.

education.summary: Specialization in machine learning, data science, and image analysis.
One-year exchange program at Lund University in Sweden.

work.name: EERL (EPFL Lab)
work.summary: Software development of an autonomous control system for tethered balloons.

work.name: EERL (EPFL Lab)
work.summary: Designed a winch autopilot software for automated airborne measurements of aerosols.

work.name: Reef Pulse
work.summary: Developed multispecies bioacoustics classification models using deep learning.

work.name: LIS (EPFL Lab)
work.summary: Studied robot behavior learning of animal locomotion through imitation learning.

work.name: LPAP (CERN Lab)
work.summary: Applied deep learning techniques for measuring the dynamic aperture.

work.name: EPFL
work.summary: Teaching Numerical & General Physics and C++ courses.

volunteer.summary: Head of Sailowtech's scientific programmes, from prototyping to field measurements during our sailing expeditions.
Managed EPFL’s art association with nearly 60 members.
Coordinated street artists for Europe's largest student festival: 15,000 festival-goers.
